name: Virutcham Magalir Munnetra Kalzangiam
briefDescription: Virutcham Magalir Munnetra Kalzangiam is a non-profit organization established by a group of socially concerned Women in the year 1997.Secretary of VMMK Ms. K. Vijaya has been a long-standing social worker in the district. Main focus of VMMK interventions are on women, Children, Transgender and MSM (Men Sex with Men) looking into their livelihood, access to welfare and protection of rights. VMMK has organized 169 women SHGs, 18 Transgender SHGs, 14 SHGs of disabled and 27 SHGâ€™s of Men.VMMK organized about 20000 unorganized sector workers and help them establish a Trade Union.Besides VMMK has also organized about 900 MSM and 635 Transgender.  2100 Children of these workers are included in various Child welfare projects.
